Reviews.Title: “excellent stay...”
Reviews.Author: Ilaria76
Reviews.Content: I come in Rome quite often for business and I always found magnolia to be a great choice for the traveller who need a quiet and comfortable accomodation close to citycenter without spending a fortune. But this time they went beyond my excpectations with a brand new room worth of a 4 star hotel at the same affordable prices. Well done guys!!

Reviews.Title: “Pleasantly surprised by the spacious apartment.”
Reviews.Author: Adrianella
Reviews.Content: Almost unanimously all in our group enjoyed our stay. The apartments are clean, spacious and comfortable. The staff were overly solicitous and ensured that we had a wonderful stay. I found some of the other reviews to be the total opposite of our experience. I would not hesitate to recommend this to anyone!

Reviews.Title: “Horrible..dirty, in a bad area”
Reviews.Author: irelandreg
Reviews.Content: Not much else to say, the place looks like a slum tenement, furniture broken and worn, our 2 bedroomed apartment was actually one mezzanine room, Net curtains were almost black, bathroom impossible to use. Extremely noisy. As for the area, we actually feared for our safety at night, surrounded by nasty looking high rise flats with gangs hanging around. We left after one night and found a nicer place to stay. Do not give them your credit card until you have seen the room. we made that mistake and they charged the full week immediately and it took calling the owner several times each day of our holiday to finally get our money back

HotelInfo.Name: Hotel Residence Magnolia
HotelInfo.Address: via di Valle Aurelia, 116, 167 Rome, Italy
